import pandas as pd

towns = pd.read_csv('towns.csv', header=None, names=['Town', 'Type', 'County',  'Governance', 'Population 2010','Year Established'])
towns.head()
Town Type County Governance Population 2010 Year Established
0 Abington Town Plymouth Open town meeting 15,985 1712
1 Acton Town Middlesex Open town meeting 21,924 1735
2 Acushnet Town Bristol Open town meeting 10,303 1860
3 Adams Town Berkshire Representative town meeting 8,485 1778
4 Agawam City[4] Hampden Mayor-council 28,438 1855 
print ', '.join([n.replace(' ', '_').replace('-','_') for n in towns['Town'].values])
